General.Name: Osaka Gas Co. Ltd
General.Description: Osaka Gas Co., Ltd. provides gas, electricity, and other energy products and services in Japan and internationally. It operates through three segments: Domestic Energy Business, the International Energy Business, and the Life & Business Solutions Business. The Domestic Energy Business segment manufactures, supplies, and sells city gas; sells gas appliances; installs gas pipeline; sells and transports LNG; sells LPG and industrial gas; and generates and sells electricity. The International Energy Business engages in development and investment related to natural gas; and supply of energy. The Life & Business Solutions Business is involved in the development and leasing of real estate properties; offers information processing services; and sale of fine materials and carbon material products. The company was founded in 1897 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.
